description: "The colonial territories of British North Borneo are shown in pink on this late 19th century map, with Brunei and Sarawak in green, and Dutch colonial territory in yellow. Sea routes around the British Empire are depicted on an inset map. "
title: "A map of British North Borneo : Compiled from the English Admiralty Charts and from surveys and exploration s of Messrs. F.X. Witti, W.B. Pryer, F. Hatton, Henry Walker, D.D. Daly and R.D. Beeston in the service of the British North Borneo Company [cartographic material]"
